```{r}

}
```

```{r}
connect_to_dodo(url = url, remember = FALSE)
##
od_node_type <- list_node_type()
od_db <- list_database()

match (n:Database)<-[r:is_in]-(d:Concept)-[r1:is_xref]->(d1:Concept)
return n.name as database, count(d1) as count LIMIT 10
```
